charecters.name: Dwight Schrute
charecters.quote: And I did not become a Lackawanna County volunteer sheriff’s deputy to make friends. And by the way, I haven’t

charecters.name: Jim Halpert
charecters.quote: I miss Dwight. Congratulations, universe. You win.

charecters.name: Pam Beesly
charecters.quote: I DON’T CARE WHAT THEY SAY ABOUT ME. I JUST WANT TO EAT.

charecters.name: Ryan Howard
charecters.quote: I’M SUCH A PERFECTIONIST THAT I’D KINDA RATHER NOT DO IT AT ALL THAN DO A CRAPPY VERSION.

charecters.name: Andy Bernard
charecters.quote: Andy Bernard does not lose contests. He wins them. Or he quits them. Because they're unfair.

charecters.name: Kevin Malone
charecters.quote: I DO DESERVE A VACATION. SOMETIMES BATMAN’S GOT TO TAKE OFF HIS CAPE

charecters.name: Creed Bratton
charecters.quote: I Already Won The Lottery, I Was Born In The U-S Of A, Baby
